name: From Scratch (itch)
description:
Starting with nothing, cook up an apple pie.

Collect items and use them to interact with other things!

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
E - Interact

This was originally made for Ludum Dare 45. The current version (0.9) is what we had after the 72 hour mark with no alterations or fixes made, so expect imperfection.

Made by:

  • Liam Allen-Miller - @RSSLiam
  • Daniel Swieca - @Wetalo
  • Angela Elliott - @holosericahime
